package.name: ParadoxLabs_StorePickup
package.summary: Shipping method that allows your customers to pickup their purchases instead of having them shipped.
package.description: Store Pickup is a shipping method extension that gives your customers the option to pickup their purchases in your store instead of having them shipped. You can set a fixed (flat) or percentage-based (variable) shipping fee, or make it totally free.
package.notes: Fixed issues causing the extension not to work under specific conditions Key Changes: * Cleaned up code * Fixed issue with all store locations sharing the same method code * Fixed issue with shipping method not being shown when handling fee is 0
